thread.section_title: CarTrawler Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CarTrawler | www.cartrawler.com | 46 of 805
thread.title: E.B., Seattle

author: E.B., Seattle
title: E.B., Seattle
text:
After a fairly long flight to Honolulu I want to get my car and drive to the North Shore asap. Our Thrifty shuttle driver got us from the airport to the lot quickly and he was fun to ride with. There was no wait at the desk once at the Thrifty lot. The customer service there was friendly and efficient. We were on our way in no time.
On our return the lot attendant had the car checked back in before we even got our bags out of the back. The same shuttle driver got us to the airport in a friendly manner and unfortunately our vacation was over.
Thank you Thrifty for helping to make it a wonderful time!
